food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A furry animal really loves this fruit
💛 I'm the color of the sun!
🍌 I come in a bunch.

food.question: I am white and cold, and I taste yummy in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I'm very cold.
🍦 You can put sprinkles on me.
👅 Kids love to lick me.

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a type of fruit.
🌳 I grow on a tree.
❤️ I am the color of love.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a vegetable.
🐰 A bunny's favorite snack.
👓 Eating me can help you see better.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that can be red, green, or purple. I grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in different colors.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🍷 You can make juice or jam from me.

food.question: I am made of milk, but I'm not liquid. I can be yellow, white, or orange, and you can slice me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal.
🐭 Mice love to eat me.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and I'm baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can eat me for breakfast.
🌾 I am made from wheat.
🔥 I need to be cooked to taste good.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I'm green.
🌳 I look like a miniature tree.
💪 Eating me makes you strong.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. I am sour and sweet at the same time. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I grow on a vine.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.
I am native to New Zealand and China

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked in water or broth. I can be short or long, and I'm often served with sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 Many people eat me in Asia.
💧 I need water to cook properly.
🥣 I am often served with curry or stir-fry.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make honey!
🐝 I go buzz buzz
🌼 I like flowers

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. Children sing songs about me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a symbol of good luck!
🔴 I am usually red with black spots.
🎶 There's a song with my name!

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself.
🏘️ I live underground in a colony.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My legs are very strong.
🌿 I like to eat plants.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I build a home out of silk. Then I turn into a beautiful flying insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a caterpillar.
🦋 I have colorful wings when I grow up.
🏡 I hide inside a chrysalis.

bug.question: I light up at night with my own light. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am a beetle!
✨ I glow in the dark.
🌙 You can see me on summer nights.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch other insects for food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My web is very strong.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat flies and other bugs.

bug.question: I am a bug that eats wood and can destroy houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I love to eat wood.
🏠 I can cause damage to buildings.
🐜 I live in colonies like ants.

bug.question: I can be many colors, and I like to eat holes in leaves and plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I eat leaves
🐛 I crawl around.
🦋 I become a butterfly one day.

bug.question: I am a very noisy bug that comes out in the summer. I make a loud buzzing sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a very loud noise!
🌳 I live in trees.
☀️ You hear me when it's very hot outside.
